creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Margarita carrying home the chopped wood in Lyman, Donetsk region. Locals using small potbelly stoves to hear their appartments and cook food. The city was occupied by Russians and liberated by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in October 2022. The humanitarian situation remains difficult, as remaining residents have no access to gas and water, and limited access to electricity. The city was severely damaged during fighting, majority of buildings were destroyed. These days, Russian army continue shelling Lyman, killing civillians and destroing more houses almost daily.
